name: Ego (Heart/Will)
awareness: will / ego / tribal bargains (motor, not an awareness center)
biological_themes: Heart and cardiac drive (will to live, will to commit)
Stomach / digestion link (material support → nourishment → tribal survival)
Gallbladder / decision and assertion themes (taking, claiming, protecting)
Thymus / immune-tribal vitality correspondence in some HD lineages

fears.label: Fear of unworthiness
fears.description: Anxiety about not being valuable enough to be chosen, paid, or trusted.

fears.label: Fear of not being able to prove it
fears.description: Pressure to demonstrate willpower and deliver what was promised.

fears.label: Fear of the bargain failing
fears.description: Concern the tribe won’t uphold its side, or you can’t uphold yours.

fears.label: Fear of being controlled by others
fears.description: Defensive push to manage territory, resources, and rules.

gates.name: 21 — The Hunter / Huntress
gates.bargain_theme: I control the resources → we survive.
gates.core_theme: Skilled control of territory, goods, and people in service to the tribe.
gates.notes: Operates best when recognized as the correct manager. Not-self 21 tries to control everything out of insecurity. Paired with Gate 45 for the full material circuit (21-45).
sources: Jovian teachings on the Ego/Heart center (tribal control)
Standard Human Design gate keynotes for Gate 21

gates.name: 26 — The Egoist
gates.bargain_theme: I market it / remember it → tribe benefits.
gates.core_theme: Will-powered sales, persuasion, and curation of what is remembered.
quotes: “Only promise what the will can deliver.”
gates.notes: This is the ‘seller’ of the tribe. Healthy 26 is impeccably honest about capacity. Not-self 26 overpromises to prove worth.
sources: HD courses on the Ego center and the Spleen-Ego-Identity axis

gates.name: 40 — Aloneness
gates.bargain_theme: I will work for us → I get rest/love/belonging.
gates.core_theme: The will to work for the tribe, and the will to rest.
quotes: “The will to work for the community.”
gates.notes: This is the gate that completes the classic 37–40 bargain: 40 offers work and provision, 37 offers family and recognition. Not-self 40 keeps working without receiving.

gates.name: 51 — Shock / The Arousing
gates.bargain_theme: I initiate through shock → you awaken.
gates.core_theme: Competitive will that initiates others through challenge or shock.
gates.notes: This is the only individual gate in the Ego center. It uses will to break complacency. Can look provocative or harsh if not invited.

notes:
The Ego / Heart / Will center is the motor for promises, worth, and material/tribal bargains. It is small and intermittent — it is not designed to work all day. Defined Ego → fixed sense of value and capacity to commit; undefined Ego → vulnerability to proving, overworking, and taking on promises to look worthy. Classic Jovian-style teachings stress: “Never promise from an undefined Heart.”

Approx. Jovian-style keynotes under 25 words (not verbatim from Line Companion):
- “This is the center of willpower and material commitments.”
- “Ego is tribal: it bargains, it doesn’t universalize.”
- “Only promise what the Heart can actually do.”
- “Rest is part of the bargain.”
